column1: I believed these students all to like John.
Jack ate more of this than he ate of that.
Bob is very serious about Mary, but less so than Paul.
Paula spanked the naughty child's back.
Odysseus planned to hear the sirens.
Cora coiled the post with the rope.
Emily showed himself Benjamin in the mirror.
The new tax Jaws will gain the middle class.
Jill gave the ball towards Bob.
Who seemed that had poisoned Jason?
